channel.title: JMBCraft [PvP] [Raiding] [24/7] [SuperNaturals] [LaggFree] [Griefing]
channel.description:
IP: 178.239.163.51:25575
JMBCraft-HardCore Factions and PvP Server! JMBCraft Is a full on PvP server with SuperNatural classes like vampires and demons which make your gameplay funner and easier, we allow every aspect of PvP from Faction Wars to Greifing enemy bases With TNT enabled and Fire Spread!. Features! - Anti X-Ray - NoCheatPlus - SuperNaturals - Citizens - iConomy - TopPvP - Custom Messages - SpamGuard - PvP Money - Battle Night - Essentials - Factions - HardCore PvP! - Working DynMap: http://jmbcraftfactions.nn.pe/ Coming Soon~ - 5 Hour Death Ban for Extra HardCore - New PvP Arena
Staff- Hosted by: Nitrous-Networks.com 24/7 Hosting Joint Owners~ PuneyWhiteBoy,Jontaaaay and BraandenJames Admins~ corky1926 and INiinja Mods~OmgIm2Good
Donations- All Donations will be invested into making the Server Better! What you get from donating: - Extra Lives when we introduce Death Ban - Duke Rank InGame - Custom NickName of YOUR Choice! - The Ability to Tpa
I Hope to see Many "Legit" Players :D
~PuneyWhiteBoy This server is Bukkit Version R4.0
